channel.title: Need help brainstorming for dual wielding
channel.description:
hey, i really need help with adding on dual wield to my server; i was thinking that the simplest way would be to change it in the charecters menu. on my server equip 3 is weapon and 5 is shield, so i was wondering if there was a way to make it be like equip = 1 -1 0 equip = 2 -1 0 equip = 3 -1 0 equip = 4 -1 0 equip = 3/5 -1 0 would something like this be possible or would i have to change a few weapons to "equip 5"?
would it be easyer to add extra items with the same name, and look just different id number and equip number? [b][/b]

item.title: Need help brainstorming for dual wielding

item.description:

i was just wondering because it would be a great addon to have dual wield ill probably figure something out eventually

item.description:
@deathboy345 wrote:

hey, i really need help with adding on dual wield to my server; i was thinking that the simplest way would be to change it in the charecters menu. on my server equip 3 is weapon and 5 is shield, so i was wondering if there was a way to make it be like
equip = 1 -1 0
equip = 2 -1 0
equip = 3 -1 0
equip = 4 -1 0
equip = 3/5 -1 0
would something like this be possible or would i have to change a few weapons to “equip 5”?

would it be easyer to add extra items with the same name, and look just different id number and equip number?
